exposurecontrolsystem: (P) Program AE (Program Shift is possible), (S) Shutter Speed Priority AE, (A) Aperture Priority AE, (M) Manual
autobracketing: With 3 flames bracketing:1/3EV Steps Up to ±3EV
recordingmode: Lossless   compression RAW data (12-bit, High, Medium, Low), JPEG (High, Medium,   Low), RAW+JPEG, Movie (motion jpeg), Voice memo to still images (10sec.)
power: Li-ion Battery Pack BP-41, Battery Charger BC-41
colormode: 7 types (Standard, Vivid, Neutral, Portrait, Landscape, B&W, Sepia)
focuslock: Shutter release halfway-down position, AE lock button
storagemedia: SD Card / Compatible with SDHC, Multi Media Card
lcdmonitorlanguage: English   / Japanese / German / French / Spanish / Italian / Chinese (Simplified)   / Korean / Russian / Chinese (Traditional) / Nederlands / Polski /   Português / Dansk / Svenska / Norsk / Suomi
meteringsystems: Evaluative Metering, Center-Weighted Average Metaring, Spot Metering
whitebalance: 8 types (Auto, Daylight, Shade, Overcast, Incandescent, Fluorescent, Flash, Custom)
